description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Do you always forget your friends birthday? Or did you ever miss an appointment? Now you can organize all your dates on your Xbox - with Avatar Calendar
description.short: Do you always forget your friends birthday? Or did you ever miss an appointment? Now you can organize all your dates on your Xbox - with Avatar Calendar
